website_summaries.verdict: A handblown tall glass design that can help your wine taste better.
pros: A fancy design that is still simple and practical
Company promises replacement if glasses are broken in shipping

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant and thin glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like my wine glass to look luxurious and super light. And those do! I love them! Great quality and very helpful customer service. I reordered them because I like them so much. 5 out of 6 came labeled at the base of the glass. I contacted the seller and with no hesitation I am receiving new glasses all labeled the way I like it - with a tiny little fox head!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They used to be 40USD a few months ago?
customer_reviews.text: They held up fairly well at the bar ( yes I bring my own wine glasses, you peasant!) but The were 40 dollars before ... I'm not sure what exactly necessitated a 50 percent price increase but they are definitely not 80 dollar quality ....even 50 dollars for the set would give me pause ...
customer_reviews.author: badcopgoodcop

customer_reviews.title: and these glasses are better quality than in the majority of upper scale wine ...
customer_reviews.text: None were broken, they were packed in styrofoam, and these glasses are better quality than in the majority of upper scale wine bars I've visited. They are feather light, have a brilliant shine, and are delicate but can hold up to a little accidental hit. Loved them, got them on Saturday, had friends over that night and received compliments. I'll be purchasing these for a wedding present as well. I'll update this post if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent L Reyes

customer_reviews.title: nicely balanced, and comfortably hold a large pour
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely set of glasses. They are the only glasses I use now. They are very elegant looking, nicely balanced, and comfortably hold a large pour. Make sure you research the height of the different glass types available from this brand if you are trying to fit them into a compact space. The ones I purchased are very tall (not a downside to me).
customer_reviews.author: B00KW0RM

customer_reviews.title: One came broken but otherwise classy looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice wine glasses. Super thin but very classy looking. Sadly one of the glasses came broken. Hoping the seller will reach out to me so I can get a replacement. Otherwise, no problems as of now. UPDATE*** the owner sent me a replacement in which I was very pleased with. Thank you David!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Evans

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful elegant and fragile glasses
customer_reviews.text: I would absolutely echo every review of how thin the glasses are. Foot, stem and bowl are thicker glass, half way up the rim and the rim are VERY thin. Beautiful glasses and very good deal for the price. Will update review of glasses break. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: therlynch

customer_reviews.title: A very nice crystal glass
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrived within the shipping period. The glasses were packaged well and all made it through shipment unbroken. I was surprised how light they were to hold in the hand.They are very beautiful crystal glasses and look great with some red wine in them. Note: They are fragile and will break if you are washing a glass and you tap the side of the sink..
customer_reviews.author: IT Department

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely
customer_reviews.text: I confess--I forgot I ordered these. When I received them, it was like Christmas. These are just lovely glasses and I was delighted. When they all break, as all wine glasses do, I'll order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design but fragile
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses - they look great and classy - but they are very thin glass. They are also very tall, so check your cupboard height! I will enjoy serving guests with these but will be prepared for breakage😝
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mc Leod

customer_reviews.title: Not durable- would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of 6 glasses about 6 months ago. Within the first month one broke- the seller was great and replaced it right away. Now, 6 months later, another has broke in the same place. It’s my conclusion that the glass in this spot is too thin and weak and not very durable. Would not recommend for every day use or gifting to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Light and thin, but lovely and durable
customer_reviews.text: Light but durable. So far no breakage and I've used them plenty. Even ran them through the dishwasher. No. Problem. Very nice glasses, you won't be disappointed but expect a very light, thin glass.
customer_reviews.author: LouCutrone

customer_reviews.title: Thin glass
customer_reviews.text: The glass is very thin so one must be extra careful with them. Can't see them lasting long if someone gets even a little exuberant with a glass clinking toast.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Jones-Krivitskiy

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great set of glasses
customer_reviews.text: High quality good looking wine glasses. With only one problem that bugs me very badly. They put very low quality sticker on their glasses, I tried to peal them off, but I can't without leaving some residual adhesive on the glass. Then you have to wash very carefully to get them all off. Would be nice if they come with higher quality sticker or just don't bother putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Extremely breakable,  but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So pretty.... can't even wash without breaking. Really beautiful though. Just expect 1 or 2 uses before death.
customer_reviews.author: barefootcharlies74

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement please!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box. Like the glass; beautiful, welll made with great quality. Wish I could give 4-5 stars for it. But once peeling the sticker off and checking each glass closely, there’s one glass has a couple small little broken skid marks almost 2 cms long on the side. It’s quite disappointing. I’d like to keep the glass but hope to get a replacement for just one if possible. Otherwise I probably have to return it all. Hope to hear from the customer service soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Ging Levitt

customer_reviews.title: easily broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wine glasses a little before Christmas. They were the shape I was looking for and I liked that they were lightweight. I haven't used them very much, until the other night. When I went to HAND-WASH it extremely gently the next morning, the glass completely shattered. By reading other reviews it seems that this is a common problem- ridiculous. Now I do not have a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Camp

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: So light they feel like plastic. We broke 2 within the first few days of arrival.
customer_reviews.author: corb C

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in Pieces...Have Pics Def Happened
customer_reviews.text: Product came with a broken glass. Now if I have 11 friends that want matching wine glasses, we are screwed. Very disappointed in the product although the 11 that are left are nice. Also they had weird stickers that would not come all the way off.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Pearsall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but HUGE
customer_reviews.text: These make a stunning addition to our holiday table but they are HUGE and do not fit in our kitchen cabinets. I do believe they are of great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin_Alias

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these
customer_reviews.text: These red wine glasses were exactly what we were hoping for, tall, elegant, thinner to the top (less glass, more wine), beautiful to look at and wonderful to serve guests. You won’t be disappointed in these. Well packaged too. The shape works well for white wine as well in my opinion, ample bowl but nicely angled for white. Great swirl and legs. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Newman

customer_reviews.title: Messy Sicker Removal
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are ok. They are as expected. The MIKO stickers attached to each glass are extremely hard to remove from the glasses. IT TOOK HOURS AND THERE IS STILL GLUE RESIDUE. Makes the glasses look cheep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and nicely sized - no more small wine glasses or large ...
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and nicely sized - no more small wine glasses or large tumblers for me. These glasses are a welcome addition to the drinks cabinet. All 6 arrived intact and very well wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these glasses are very poor, they are very light (like plastic), don’t sound like glass and overall feeling from touching it— very cheap. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Hsien-Chiao L.

customer_reviews.title: Very classy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking stemware! Light as a feather and easy to hold all evening. They are however extremely fragile! I fully expect I'll break the first one simply hand washing it. I'm scared just putting the wash rag inside.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Show stopper
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I haven’t had any issue with stains, it being too fragile, and my guests love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: 1000% recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with these and am recommending them to everyone I know. Incredible quality and style regardless of the low price - they feel and look very expensive. I did not experience issues with breakage and I am extremely clumsy. 1000% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Packaging needs improvement as one glass came broken; however, Amazon provided an swift discount. Would recommend the product to others.
customer_reviews.author: CSM

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape and weight of these glasses. Have bought 2 dozen. Hard chine is perfect pour regulator for the wine enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: My wife broke two with an ice ball, how can I go about getting a replacement glasses to complete the set?
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Trash and a spill waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are the most delicate cheaply made wine glasses I have ever seen. I ordered 8 glasses I might have 3 left. One glass shattered simply from hot water, another while picking it up full of red wine and the others from just trying to wash them. Absolutely do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Emmett

customer_reviews.title: In Love with these Glasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wine classes! they are beautiful and wonderful to drink from. I want to buy the rest of them and the matching decanter. They ship fast and they did not break during shipping. Love them and I would recommend them to anyone that likes wine and want a stylish wine glass! 100% happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine stemware at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: These wine stems are well designed and high quality. my only issue is they are almost to delicate. Handwashing is a MUST and with the utmost care. For those with a delicate touch seeking nice stems, these work well!
customer_reviews.author: artie macon

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are the best. We have been looking for then a long time and found these and we fell in love from the moment they came out the box. Arrived in perfect condition, beautiful crystal. I only hand wash them due to then being such a thin crystal glass. Greatest buy so far off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Sent my wife a selfie from Germany with a wine glass in the foreground, she said she really liked that wine glass, so I knew just what to get her for our anniversary. Looked on amazon and found Miko had exactly the same glass. Ordered the 6 pack of Cabernet glasses and they’re perfect! They are beautiful, and my wife loves them. They were packaged really well too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Z

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We opened one box and found five out of the glasses had major imperfections including big bubbles in the glass, in the exact same place! We didn’t bother opening the second one. Was there a quality control process in making these glasses? It doesn’t appear so.
customer_reviews.author: SheepDog_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses; excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses...very solid. One glass had a broken stem, and Miko customer service shipped 2 replacements right away. Best customer service ever!
customer_reviews.author: tdcrump

customer_reviews.title: Great wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely and they arrived in perfect condition. They are fragile, but they're wine glasses...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these wine glasses! Pretty durable. One did break, but it was dropped from pretty high up. We get lots of compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bailey

customer_reviews.title: very light weight and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking glass, will keep for special occasion as I feel they will break quickly
customer_reviews.author: Gail F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Cab Wine Glaseses on The Market
customer_reviews.text: The cab really opened up as it swirled around the glass. Unfortunately they break easy. Hand wash and be careful. If you drop them or fall over on a granite counter top there done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service, Beautiful Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of the glasses. They can break easily though, but the customer service is excellent! Broke one in the sink while washing and I was sent a replacement for free!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beautiful in a simple, classic way. The packaging was done in a very thorough manner and made sure that all glasses arrived undamaged. They are quite tall and will hold a generous pour if you are so inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: She loved them. Very light-weight and delicate
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift... She loved them. Very light-weight and delicate, but also durable. If you like a thinner, more delicate glasses, this is worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: tienglongmy

customer_reviews.title: Exellent
customer_reviews.text: Wine glasses came in excellent packaging. Glasses itself were better than what I had envisaged. Tall, excellent shape. I am very pleased with the quality and the looks of the glass. I highly recommend these glass to anyone looking to own high-quality red wine glasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking glasses that are extremely fragile
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cab glasses that are extremely fragile. I’ve broken 3 out of 6 in a month hand washing them. My regular glass Burgundy style glasses have lasted 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Light weight with a thin lip. Very nice and classy. Haven't washed numerous times yet as we just got them 3 days ago, but all glasses were in good shape upon delivery. Will update if they break.
customer_reviews.author: Cristen Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great glass
customer_reviews.text: These are sweet. The feel is weightless and the design is perfect for some good red.
customer_reviews.author: Dan gilligan

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING
customer_reviews.text: They’re gorgeous and so well made. Easy to clean up too.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Cluster

customer_reviews.title: Elegant wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant looking and will class up any dinner party. I love the shape of these and the way they curve in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. I’ve used them and really liked them. Very tall stems and large bowls. Sturdy and not worried about breaking them. Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Graham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I wanted and they are great for every day use. I love them!! I have had them for almost 6 months now and use them a lot and they are durable and perfect for hosting! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Glasses were lovely and packaging was great. Everything came promptly. Very happy. Wine glasses work for either red or white wine too. Nice style.
customer_reviews.author: L.E. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Elegant wine glasses! Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Found these after searching for elegant wine glasses I love at high end hotel bars .
customer_reviews.author: Tlmpdm

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and I love them, good quality at a good price. They were packaged well with a nice Thank you and contact information from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Thin glass....
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought these glasses would be heavier than they are!
customer_reviews.author: DeDe Rose

customer_reviews.title: VERY fragile. Hand washers BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these glasses.. one came broken in package, and two broke after 2 HAND washes. Disappointing because they are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Missing Glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I bought some we liked the first set. However, when we opened the box there were 2 glasses missing........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fragile, very thin glass. Spouse dropped an ice cube into glass of white and it shattered the glass. Won't last. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gredvig

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful, delicate
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are a gift ,but I did open them to see the quality. They are beautiful, delicate, love the shape. I'm sure the recipient with love them as well
customer_reviews.author: fieldz

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. TWO of the glasses broke already literally used it one time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 broke easily but customer service was helpfuk
customer_reviews.text: Had a few glasses which broke easily so reached out to customer service and they have been very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Killian Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shape
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but solid. Great shape for most wines. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sean C

customer_reviews.title: Extremely breakable.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and delicate, but only 1 of 6 has survived in 4 months. They are essentially single-use.
customer_reviews.author: Yossarian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM, but one did arrive broken :(
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses but one arrived broken. I’m hoping to get a replacement but I’m not sure how to contact the company about the issue. If someone reads this and can reach out to me I’d really appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marie Resko

customer_reviews.title: For people who love wine
customer_reviews.text: Wow I've been looking for these glasses for a long time
customer_reviews.author: moshe ludmir

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! Look and feel way more expensive than they are. Modern and sleek. Very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ceil

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY OF STEMWARE
customer_reviews.text: I love the uniqueness of the stemware.I had been wanting a different style for some time now . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ventus

customer_reviews.title: ... made and for the price you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses are quality made and for the price you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: DaJuan James

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: 2 glasses came with broken stems. I tried to add a photo but had trouble doing so
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Glasses arrived in perfect condition. I actually managed to drop one on ...
customer_reviews.text: Glasses arrived in perfect condition. I actually managed to drop one on a granite counter top unpacking it and it didn't break. These seem to be really well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the glasses are awesome but it had to be returned because one of ...
customer_reviews.text: the glasses are awesome but it had to be returned because one of the six was a totally different glass
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Maciejewski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son's girlfriend for Christmas. Glasses arrived on time and intact.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miko Cabernet wine glass
customer_reviews.text: Wine glasses are light and sexy! I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but one broken
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses, however the box it came in was damaged and one of the stems was broken. There did not seem to be a lot of protection in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: Broken in the Box
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are wonderful, but my box arrived with two broken glasses and this was a gift for a dear friend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael S.

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy with my purchase which I needed for dinner guests ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with my purchase which I needed for dinner guests that evening because I did not have enough matched good quality red wine glasses. These arrived the SAME DAY! How they did it I have no idea, but they arrived perfectly packaged; the glasses were very pretty and felt great in the hand. Planning on buying another set! Great price for set of 6.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ferretti

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Glasses...I wish Amazon had more. ):
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the Miko Cabernet glasses. The size, shape and proportion make for a great glass to use with your nicer bottles of wine. Very elegant. They are a bit fragile, but I think that is inevitable with higher end glasses. I tried the Miko Burgundy glasses and returned them as they were too tall and slender for my liking. I bought the Bordeaux glasses as well for the French bottles. I would really like to order another set of the Cab glasses, but they are no longer available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Holds wine and sings
customer_reviews.text: Unlike regular crystal, there is no led in these, they replaced the metal with titanium which I think makes them more durable. That said, they are VERY thin, so when that uncle comes by who drinks a little too much at family gatherings, and starts to stumble, maybe put them away.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Wine Glasses - And Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these glasses! Their customer service is AMAZING also! We had a glass break while we were getting it out of the packaging, and they actually sent us a replacement, knowing that we broke it by accident getting it out. This is above and beyond service. And they are very classy, beautiful wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy E.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The Miko glasses are beautiful! They're very well made. Beautiful crystal and modern styling - the glasses make a statement just sitting on a table. We could not be happier with them. Moreover Easysole has been wonderful to work with. We had a question about the glasses and they quickly responded to our question. Clearly they value their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Muschetto

customer_reviews.title: VERY tall, super huge large glasses, for giants
customer_reviews.text: Super high, extremely tall glasses - enormous had to return them, way too high to store in my glass cabinets, the glass literally holds a half of a wine bottle by itself very big, very very high stem
customer_reviews.author: BlueBird

customer_reviews.title: 5 of the 6 wine glasses are beautiful. Very elegant but unfortunately very fragile
customer_reviews.text: 5 of the 6 wine glasses are beautiful. Very elegant but unfortunately very fragile. One wineglass was totally smashed to pieces upon delivery. I’m hoping customer service reads this to reach out to me for a replacement. Update: great customer service. Very generous replacement received for the broken wine glass. They are all beautiful now!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pearse

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when I ordered them. But now that I received them and see that I paid for 6 glasses, but can only use 5 is dissappointing. 1 glass came broken as you can see in the picture. I feel like I should either get my money back or a replacement. It is not fair that I paid full price for these and didn’t get what I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Gatitany

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the set of cabernet glasses - 5 were fine, but one was broken at the neck of the stem. I contacted the seller to let them know, and they happily shipped out a replacement the next day. The glasses themselves are great as well - very classy looking, with a nice weight to them. Not overly heavy, but not flimsy either. Gifted a set to a friend as well, and they love them too
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Thin / Cheap / Feels Like Plastic
customer_reviews.text: The glass is a beautiful design. Downfall is do not cheers, place in the sink or use these. The product is so thin they feel like plastic. Horrible buy, would not recommend to anyone even if just for decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Latiolais

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a wine tasting party. Although the stems are a tad short for "fancy" wine glasses, you could not tell a difference in the quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anjuli woods

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a friend of mine she absolutely loved them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Last glass came broken in box at stem no contact info to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and elegant. I love these glasses - made quite an impression on my guests. Amazing product and great Service from this company
customer_reviews.author: Linda Little

customer_reviews.title: Nice but VERY fragile
customer_reviews.text: Uber fragile. Broke one soon after getting them. Was being extra careful while drying and the stem snapped off. Nice glasses but don’t expect them to last long.
customer_reviews.author: RDS554

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: service was great, even 1st attempt had broken stem for one glass, company shipped overnight new box. Glasses have nice shape and look fancy. These are tall glasses and not every shelf might fit them without adjusting space in between. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous wine glasses at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses arrived on time, with no scratches or broken glass. These will work for red or white, in my opinion. Love the simple and sheek look. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Check the sizes 'cuz some of these are HUGE. They seem to be of good quality. Fast shipping. Ring like crystal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Henkelman

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Elegant, classic,. It's a perfect glass for a variety of wines
customer_reviews.author: SFO Dad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crystal wine glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These are thin and graceful red wine glasses. They are a pleasure to hold and to drink from.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Sliva

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses. Birthday present for my wife and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: SteveH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses arrived well-wrapped. Perfect size for either white or red wine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi T.

customer_reviews.title: Way too fragile
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses are so thin and fragile. I’ve broken four in the past two months. One exploded in my hand while I was gently cleaning it. Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Packer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were exactly as described, reasonably priced, and arrived on time. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice wine glasses. A little lighter in weight than I expected. One came damaged and Amazon refunded for broken glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Miko Wine Glasses, Pure Lead Free Crystal, Wine Glass Set Of 6 (Burgundy)
feature_bullets: Wine glasses that are made of the finest materials. Crystal wine glasses by Miko are sturdy and enjoyable to drink from. Our unique crystal glasses are shiny, lead-free, and thin but durable. Great for either red or white wine.
The wide shape of the glasses allow you to swish and swirl your wine with ease. The elegant Burgundy wine glasses are easy to clean and non-porous.

The 6 glasses are well packaged to prevent breakages and keep them safe. Unfortunately there are no guarantees but if any glasses break during the shipping process, we will gladly replace them for you.

Dishwasher safe, however we recommend to hand wash in order to preserve the quality and shine of the glasses. Our glassware will make a perfect gift to your loved ones and is great for any occasion. Enjoy that beautiful cling today.

Dimensions: 10.5"H x 3.9"W x 3.9"L Capacity - 19.443 OZ, Please understand the glass shipping process and if you receive any broken glasses, simply message us directly and we will gladly replace them for you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars206 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
